description:
PRIVATE OASIS
Spread over a single level, this home has been designed to complement the relaxed island lifestyle and permanent living. This stylish home includes 3 large bedrooms with a shared bathroom and a stunning master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite, spacious dual living areas and outdoor entertaining areas including an additional decking area off the low maintenance garden to catch the afternoon sun! The spacious kitchen & living is well appointed with stainless steel appliances, generous bench space, plenty of storage and extends through to the double sliding doors to the outdoor decking with separate BBQ areas.
Additional features of the property include a double carport, under house storage, 2 split systems, clear run perfect to store a boat or jetski, separate laundry and garden shed.
Located in a quiet court, this property is within walking distance to local parks and children's’ playground and only a short distance from beautiful beaches, natural attractions, cafes and restaurants. This immaculate home embraces the essence of a tranquil coastal lifestyle.
Arrange your private inspection today.

Got An Eye For Potential!
Do not miss this opportunity to secure a prime location in the heart of Cowes!
Within minutes walk to the popular Cowes shopping precinct, doctors and Cowes primary school is this two bedroom and one bathroom beauty. Comprising open plan living, kitchen and dining, along with a fully enclosed entertainment area, this property provides the opportunity to enjoy the Island life all year round!
The backyard ensures privacy with mature trees and established lawns, as well as playground area at the rear. There is also a self-contained cabin, offering a fully functioning kitchenette and bathroom.
Other features include air conditioning, combustion heating and a double garage. All set within a generous 1,056sqm approx. allotment, holding lots of potential to subdivide (STCA).
There is also a current tenant in place allowing for instant return. The possibilities are endless.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

PERFECT LOCATION, AFFORDABLE CHARM!
This property is charmingly unique, with huge potential. Close to all amenities in a quiet location, and just a stone throw away from Red Rocks beach
Set on approx. 627m2 this weatherboard cottage style home is located in the highly sought Red Rocks area of Cowes.
Featuring 2.5 bedrooms, family bathroom open plan living area, the large rear room could be used as the third bedroom, a study or a sunroom, this is a rare find indeed with character, heart and soul.
Other great features include polished timber floorboards throughout, 2 x split system heating and cooling units, combustion heater. The front verandah is perfect for the morning coffee and to enjoy the private front yard plus a spacious rear entertaining deck, overlooking the rear garden.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

COWES FORESHORE APARTMENT
Centrally located on the foreshore in Cowes, this apartment is located within the Waves Apartment Complex. This studio apartment is being offered as a "walk in walk out" scenario. Features include a master bedroom with queen size bed and large plasma screen television. Kitchenette comes complete with 2 bar fridges and loads of storage space. There are an additional two single beds in the second living area and a car space comes with the property.
Where else can you get bay views from your balcony, be walking distance to all that Cowes has to offer, at this price point. A rare gem in a fantastic location!
Inspections are sure to impress.

CENTRAL LOCATION WITH SIZE AND FLEXIBILITY
Superbly located in a quiet street and within easy walking distance to Cowes north facing bay beach and a short walk in to Cowes Central, this coastal style home embraces size and flexibility as an existing holiday investment property.
Consisting of 5 spacious bedrooms and 2 bathrooms on a 663m2 block of land, spread over two levels with a large lower level back deck.
Features include beautiful polished floor boards, open plan kitchen and adjoining dining, huge floor to ceiling windows and sliding doors which open to the warm north facing covered deck. A fully fenced yard for safety of children and pets, the two car separate car port and another under the front deck is extra protection for boats/vehicles.
Anderson Boat ramp is located around the corner for the aquatic adventurer and local facilities (childcare centre) up the road.

ONLY MOMENTS TO COWES CENTRAL
A spacious two storey four bedroom/two bathroom/2 living (plus study) home situated at the end of a quiet court, is ready for the new owners to move in.
Only a short walk in to Cowes, the centre hub of Phillip Island providing cafes, restaurants, shops and supermarkets, closer to the Cowes General Store and is located less than 350m to the beautiful north facing beach of Westernport Bay.
Upstairs offers three of the bedrooms, bathroom and living which can be accessed via an external stair case as well as internally. Downstairs provides the master bedroom, ensuite, study, laundry, large living and access to the single garage.
With the property built to the rear of the boundary, the large north facing deck overlooks the enormous fully fenced front yard. An original Bourke Street converted gas lantern is an attractive feature of this space.
Extra features are landscaped gardens, concrete driveway, split systems on both floors for heating and cooling.
For private inspection please call Jenni Kent 0428566643

address: Villa 148/2128 Phillip Island Road Cowes VIC 3922
description:
INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY
An affordable investment opportunity, within the beautiful Ramada Resort located on pristine Phillip Island. An easy 1.5 hour drive from Melbourne. It consists of 2 spacious bedrooms, 1 bathroom and a bright and sunny open plan living, dining and kitchen. This Villa is uniquely situated in the prime location of the resort overlooking a farmland and opposite the Cafés and facilities.
This investment opportunity within the Resort will appeal to corporate couples, singles or families looking for a luxurious, relaxing, maintenance free getaway.
The resort offers a cafe/bar, indoor gym, games room and walking trails full of wildlife. Come and take a look and you will not be disappointed.
All of this is within a 10 minute drive to Cowes CBD, beautiful bay beaches and famous surf beaches.

North Facing Rear Yard
The perfect entertaining home site awaits, the north facing rear yard is drenched in natural light. The level block has all the atributes you could require. An easy walk to the beach only adds to this low maintence block. set in the Seagrove estate is a quiet and natural setting also directly opposite a manicured park

Large Titled Block
Titled Land 612m2 (approx.) in "Shearwater Estate" only 90 minutes drive from Melbourne
Shearwater Estate is at
• Cnr Settlement Road & Coghlans Road, Cowes
• 700 metres to Silverleaves Beach
• Opposite the Phillip Island Golf Club
• Only 3 minutes drive to Cowes' retail and café precinct
Close to
• Our Lady Star of the Sea Primary School
• Phillip Island Early Learning Centre Child Care
• Cowes Primary School
• Newhaven College
• Cowes Dental Surgery
• Cowes Therapeutic Massage Centre
• Cowes Medical Centre
Contact Naval now on 0401489262 and secure this amazing property.

TITLED BLOCK READY TO BUILD
Ready set go! Level block opposite park priced to sell, be quick
All available services, NBN, underground power, sewage, mains water & recycled water.
Shearwater offers walk ways and boardwalks throughout the estate with playgrounds and parks.
The Shearwater lake offers a relaxing environment full of birdlife and all of this only 700m from the Cowes beach.
The Cowes golf course is only a stones throw away running adjacent to the Shearwater Estate.

UNDER CONTRACT
An acreage property with boundless potential for that work-life balance. Located in a quite court location with the golf course and beaches just around the corner. Over looking a picturesque dam, this property offers 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom & 2 toilets, a large kitchen dining area, huge open plan living area conveniently adjoining the garage. Complete with split systems, a wood heater, dishwasher & connected to mains water.
The sky is certainly the limit here, a great opportunity for tradesman, families & entrepreneurs to develop & grow their chosen field. With over 200sqm of sheds with 3 phase power that working from home dream can easily become a reality.

WALK TO THE BEACH OR TOWN
This premium town house is located only a short stroll to Cowes beaches and shops. From this location you have a short walk to Cowes main street that has much to offer such as restaurants, cafes, supermarkets and spectacular north facing beach.
With 5 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms there is room for the whole family. With 2 master bedrooms, one is located on the ground floor with another upstairs all with a walk-in robes and ensuite. The spacious open plan kitchen, living & dining is located downstairs with spectacular Hardwood Timber Flooring.
Upstairs includes the second living room and 3 more well sized bedrooms and a small deck to enjoy the sun.
A remote controlled double garage allows direct access to the rear courtyard and additional parking for your boat, caravan or trailer.
This property is set up to be the ideal holiday home or permanent residence, inspect today to discover what more this property has to offer.

The Ultimate Indulgence!
Leaving you with nothing to do and exuding a relaxed feel is this stunning near new single level home, contemporary in its design.
Comprising a spacious open plan living, kitchen and dining area, second formal living zone, three robed bedrooms and two bathrooms; the master is complete with walk in robe and ensuite.
The home offers a host of additional features with the kitchen being complimented by stainless steel appliances, walk in pantry,stone bench tops, convenient servery window that overlooks the rear deck and yard. There are two split system heating and cooling units, slow combustion heater, internal access to the home from the double garage, garden shed and shear blinds.
There is a partially undercover alfresco area at the rear that flows off the main living area and is complete with an inbuilt BBQ and cabinetry and privacy blinds allowing for year round use and overlooks the lush landscaped surrounds with a fire pit area and outdoor spa. This area is sure to impress all buyers, especially those who love to entertain.
All of this is set within a 401 sqm approx allotment and situated in the ever popular Shearwater estate, the residence is only a short stroll to the Cowes Golf Course, North facing Silverleaves Beach, Shopping precinct, Primary Schools and Doctors.
Ideal for permanent or holiday living, be quick as this modern and immaculately presented home will not last long.
This house for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

IDEAL BEACH HOUSE.
The ideal beach house awaits! An extra large living area creates the perfect entertaining area.
This property could be a great investment property for either holiday or permanent rental or your new family home
Located in a quiet pocket in Cowes West.
The light filled living areas have a northern aspect which only adds to this spacious home.

Family Kingdom
If ever there was a location and house designed with families in mind, this is it!
This well designed 4-bedroom plus study home is ideally located in the heart of Seagrove Estate in Cowes, on a fully fenced 883sqm approx. allotment, right around the corner to one of Seagroves outstanding park areas.
As you enter this neatly presented home, a stylish front portico leads into the grand entrance hallway, where you get a true impression of the spacious floor plan. To the left of the hallway is the generous master bedroom suite, which showcases a large walk-in wardrobe/dressing room and a spacious ensuite fit for a king and queen, including a double vanity with twin basins, spa bath, large shower and separate toilet.
As you wander further down this impressive hall, you are greeted by a huge open-plan kitchen and dining area which has lovely views of the rear garden. The well-equipped kitchen hosts a 900mm Blanco electric oven with gas cooktop and rangehood, dishwasher and a stone bench tops. Walk in butlers pantry. The kitchen will impress any type of buyer. The formal lounge with gas log fire adjoining the family meals, which adds ambience to the house, with year-round comfort guaranteed with ducted heating and cooling throughout. A separate study offers the perfect place for a home office or perhaps a third living area, double doors open to a generous theatre/home entertainment room or rumpus ideal for relaxing and enjoying a family film.
The west wing of the home has a long central passage, which connects to a cluster of 3 generous and light filled bedrooms all with BIR's, and a second family bathroom and separate toilet. The large laundry boasts handy outside access to a wall-mounted west facing clothesline, plenty of storage and bench space.
Separating the inside from out are large sliding timber glass doors which open to the partially covered north-facing deck - a perfect destination for family entertaining and outdoor gatherings including a large 8 seater spa bath. The backyard has ample space for outdoor activity - with perfectly established gardens including and a neatly tucked away garden shed.
A host of other features include:- rear access double garage, timber laminate flooring, ducted vacuum, plantation shutters, solar panels and solar boosted hot water and much more!
This home is designed for the natural flow of family life, and perfectly located less than 1.5kms from the Anderson Road boat ramp, Cowes foreshore - shops, café's, restaurants, supermarkets and local schools and kindergartens.
So take a relaxed stroll or a quick trip in the car and you will find yourself immersed in a relaxed coastal lifestyle.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

What A Charmer!
Situated in a peaceful pocket of Cowes is this immaculate single level hardiplank residence, only a short drive to the popular Red Rocks Road beach.
Comprising an open plan living, kitchen and dining area with stunning cathedral ceilings and exposed timber beams, three robed bedrooms and one bathroom. The generous size master bedroom has direct access to an undercover entertainment area, complete with cafe blinds, that overlooks the established yet low maintenance yard.
Offering a host of additional features including combustion heating, split system heating and cooling unit, dishwasher, electric cooking, water tank, wood shed, ample storage and an abundance of power points.
Set within a 617sqm approx. fully fenced allotment with a concrete driveway that leads you to the spacious carport and garage (that is complete with lights and power). Appealing to an array of buyers, this home will not last long.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

TWO SEPARATE BEDROOMS/2 BATHROOMS
This spacious Waves apartment is one of very few apartments which do not come to the market very often. A large entrance utilised as a second living area could also be used as a petitioned third bedroom.
Master has its own ensuite and a family bathroom for the rest of the house. Open out to a large deck from the master bedroom and the living room, a great entertainers area with fabulous views of the famous Cowes North Facing Beach and Erewhon Park, including children's playground.
Renewed flooring over the tiles, modern kitchen, reverse cycle air conditioning and all the furniture included.

CONTEMPORARY LIVING IN IRRESISTIBLE LOCATION
This immaculately presented home is both spacious and light filled. Featuring an innovative floor plan that makes the most of the northern sun and creates a sense of space.
Like new throughout, the contemporary layout provides open plan living and dining, modern kitchen, two bedrooms (the master with ensuite and walk in robe) plus convenient second bathroom.
Bi fold doors link the covered outdoor alfresco area to the rest of the home, the ideal area to relax and entertain. Further inclusions of reverse-cycle air conditioning, generous storage and single remote control garage make this low maintenance property a must inspect.
Located in the environmentally sensitive Seagrove estate just 800m from the main street of Cowes and only 700m from the beach the central location speaks for itself.

Seriously Stylish
Located 50 metres approx from a popular yet secluded bay swimming beach. This character filled home is nestled behind native shrubs for privacy yet still allowing you to take advantage of the north facing water views. The home boasts 2 levels offering a very practical floorplan. The upper level enjoys modernised appeal comprising 3 bedrooms, one with ensuite, a family bathroom, open plan kitchen with ample storage, comfortable dining and a warming lounge. All with a firm focus on indoor and outdoor entertaining delivered via stacker doors out to the greatest decking area you can imagine. The lower level features a triple carport positioned in front of a double garage and an adjacent rumpus room with its own entrance, together with a shower and basin in the laundry and a separate toilet. A minimal redesign would create great opportunities to cater for the extended family or provide a teenagers retreat. Extra features include 2 separate driveways and a sunny courtyard at the rear.
Disclaimer - We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au
Property Code: 1788

NOT TO BE PASSED UP
A rare opportunity now exists to secure one of the finest positioned parcels of land in sought-after Cowes. This prime slice of real estate set on 1033 sqm. approx. is the perfect block to build your dream home (STCA) to match the equally extraordinary homes located in the area. The location is a bonus with potential water views from a second story and only moments to beach access.
The entry to this private and secluded property is surrounded by established gardens with plenty of open space to build your dream home. A property inspection is a must to realise the promising possibilities of this rare offering!
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Fabulous Coastal Resort Living!
A wonderful opportunity for coastal resort style living, located in the "Sails on Beach Street" gated complex and only a short 100 metre stroll to the gorgeous north facing bay beach of Cowes is this beautifully presented spacious double storey townhouse comprising second level master bedroom with built in robes, dual access ensuite/bathroom, generous light filled open plan living, dining and kitchen. Step out through sliding doors on to a lovely balcony perfect to relax and enjoy a home cooked breakfast whilst soaking up the morning sun!
Downstairs you will find two good sized bedrooms with built in robes, with one of the bedrooms opening out to a private paved courtyard, family bathroom including bath and European laundry with ample storage.
Other great features include - quality fixtures and fittings, 8ft ceilings, remote single garage with direct access, two split system heating/cooling units, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, stone bench tops, glass splash backs, water tank
To complete your holiday experience the resort offers shared barbecue facilities and an outdoor in ground solar heated swimming pool perfect for the ideal holiday getaway!
This is a great opportunity to purchase an investment property in a fantastic location and experience everything that Phillip Island has to offer - wonderful shops, restaurants and cafe's, beautiful bay and surf beaches, visit the many attractions and Grand Prix track!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
